pages.text: $(marked)Toads$() can be found in $(marked)jungles$() and $(marked)swamps$(), jumping happily around.
A Frog familiar grants the witch that bound it enhanced positive status effects.$(br)Killing arthropods will also heal such witches by a quarter of their maximum health.
Frogs can be tamed with $(item)Fermented Spider Eyes$(), and bred with normal $(item)Spider Eyes$().
